oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Women's sewing class
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Photograph of a group of women at a women's sewing class. Shows sewing machines, a mannequin, and a pattern board. One girl is trimming and basting. The girls have needle patches on their blouses.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Looking Back at Tennessee Photograph Collection, 1890-1981
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Students; Sewing; Sewing machines; Sewing equipment & supplies; Pattern sheets; Mannequins
